author: dreid
msg: - amend the xdocs2 configuration to include the generation of
xdocs as required and use the correct header file
With this change it will now be neccesary to have the xdocs2 repository
checked out. Once this is done you simply run the build.pl script
from that repo with the full path to the projects.xml as it's
argument and the html will be generated as before.
This change may cause some short term pain, but it makes the define between
the templates & scripts for building projects.a.o and those associated with
the more generic xdocs2 far clearer.
It's likely that there are more files that can now be removed from here,
but hopefully that will become apparent in time.

msg: Relationships based on non primarykey fields.
